# updateServiceInfo(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sends information about the current broadcast to the broadcasting app.

## Declaration

```swift
func updateServiceInfo(_ serviceInfo: [String : any NSCoding & NSObjectProtocol])
```

## Parameters

- **serviceInfo**: Dictionary that is passed back to the broadcasting app and contains information about the ongoing broadcast.

## Discussion

This method populates the [doc://com.apple.replaykit/documentation/ReplayKit/RPBroadcastController/serviceInfo] property on [doc://com.apple.replaykit/documentation/ReplayKit/RPBroadcastController] to send viewing stats or messages to the broadcasting app.

## Updating Current Broadcast Information

- **updateBroadcast(_:)**: Sends the current broadcast URL to the broadcast controller.
